subject: Re: banning spam
msgSnippet: ... I, for one, would not mind seeing the two groups merge somehow.  I realize that the two alphabets are distinct, and of course I don t want to see a
messageBody:
> We at the Shavian group have been having the same trouble as you... only difference is,
> we can't ban anyone! The moderator vanished. So we're in the process of creating a
> privately hosted mailing list that will be spammer-proof - list@.... Might be an
> idea to consider that option at some point...

I, for one, would not mind seeing the two groups merge somehow. I realize that the two
alphabets are distinct, and of course I don't want to see a which-is-better flame war start;
but it seems to me that the discussions on both lists would be interesting to members of
the other, so...

oliver
